item.title: A Letter from America
item.author: Arthur Turrell,
item.description: At 6am on Monday morning, groggy from jetlag and the 15mg of valium I took on the plane, I sat in a taxi in downtown San Francisco waiting to be driven to a car rental company. The driver asked if it was my first time in San Francisco and I told him that it was. In the blunt light of dawn, we â€¦
